entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
